introduction.title: complete electronic business system

items.title: small shop gospel

items.title: multi-payment system

items.title: time-saving is a good helper

items.title: all-round electronic business function
items.content: from the order management to marketing module, a complete combination of e - commerce features to meet all the needs of Taiwan 's sellers shop.

items.title: UX team to create easy-to-use layout
items.content: to build even the elderly can easily buy the interface to improve the turnover rate and return rate, easy to brand the first step.

items.title: integration of multiple financial and offline payments
items.content: exclusive offline payments and financial integration, small shops can easily become a network brand.
